title: feelslikeimfallinginlove

description.plain: “feelslikeimfallinginlove” is about a relationship where one lover will not abandon his partner, despite being afraid that it will not last, and that their eventual breakup will leave both him and his lover with “broken heart[s]”. Throughout the track the lover eventually finds that everything is more beautiful and enjoyable by the other person’s side – and that they throw him a “lifeline” when things get rough. The lyrics reflect his intense love for this significant other, and his gratitude for her presence in his life.

embed_content: Read “feelslikeimfallinginlove” by Coldplay on Genius
